msd.front.end

Class MongoDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • msd.front.end.MongoDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStorage

    public class MongoDataStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStorage
    This is where the mongo database connection takes place and the parsed data is stored in individual collections
